name: Turned (Cool Carrot Studios)
description:
Turned is a Zombie Infector game that pits you as the original host against the human race. They'll keep coming thick and fast and will eventually fight back.

It is down to you to infect as much of the population as possible before you're eventual demise.

Designed and submitted for the GameDev.TV Game Jam 2022.

GitHub: CoolCarrotStudios/Turned: GameDev.TV Game Jam 2022 submission (github.com)
